snippet: The market for rare and finely made vintage timepieces is booming but, as with all collectibles, there are risks.
abstract: Paul Sullivan Wealth Matters column analyzes the risks and merits of the booming market for rare and finely made vintage watches; notes that without expertise and luck on the part of the buyer, watches will not make very good investments.
lead_paragraph: The market for rare and finely made vintage timepieces is booming but, as with all collectibles, there are risks.

headline.print_headline: A Trophy Investment That Can Also Keep You Punctual
headline.seo: Fine Vintage Watches Find Popularity as Alternate Investments
headline.main: A Trophy Investment That Can Also Keep You Punctual
